member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.#ctor(System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of ClientCapability. See http://51degrees.mobi/Products/DeviceData/PropertyDictionary.aspx for a full list of available properties. All the properties used are non-lists and therefore the first item contained in the values list contains the only available value.
member.param: Reference to browser capabilities for .NET

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.#ctor(FiftyOne.Foundation.Mobile.Detection.Entities.Profile[])
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of ClientCapability. See http://51degrees.mobi/Products/DeviceData/PropertyDictionary.aspx for a full list of available properties. All the properties used are non-lists and therefore the first item contained in the values list contains the only available value.
member.param: Reference to a profile contained in the dataset

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.#ctor(FiftyOne.Foundation.Mobile.Detection.Match)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of ClientCapability. See http://51degrees.mobi/Products/DeviceData/PropertyDictionary.aspx for a full list of available properties. All the properties used are non-lists and therefore the first item contained in the values list contains the only available value.
member.param: Reference to the capabilities returned by the detection

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.GetBoolValue(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{FiftyOne.Foundation.Mobile.Detection.Entities.Profile},System.String)
member.summary: Returns the property of the HttpBrowserCapabilities collection as an boolean.
member.param: Profiles from the data set either as a result of a match, or from quering profiles.
The name of the property to return as a boolean.
member.returns: The boolean value of the property, or false if the property is not found or it's value is not an boolean.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.GetIntValue(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{FiftyOne.Foundation.Mobile.Detection.Entities.Profile},System.String)
member.summary: Returns the property of the HttpBrowserCapabilities collection as an integer.
member.param: Profiles from the data set either as a result of a match, or from quering profiles.
The name of the property to return as a integer.
member.returns: The integer value of the property, or 0 if the property is not found or it's value is not an integer.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapability.GetStringValue(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{FiftyOne.Foundation.Mobile.Detection.Entities.Profile},System.String)

member.param: Profiles from the data set either as a result of a match, or from quering profiles.
The name of the property to return as a string.
member.returns: The string value of the property, or null if the property is not found.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.GetClientCapability(System.String)
member.summary: Returns ClientCapability based on the user agent provided. If 51Degrees is enabled then the results are returned from 51Degrees. If not then the standard capabilities provider is used with the user agent of the current request.
member.remarks: The above behaviour is as implemented in prior versions with the modification to check that 51Degrees is enabled. The default provider in .NET will not be able to use the provided userAgent which is a problem where the current requests useragent and the provided useragent are different. This should be looked at in the future. TODO - determine default behaviour when 51Degrees disabled.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.GetClientCapabilityById(System.String)
member.summary: Returns ClientCapability based on device Id provided.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.GetAllClientCapabilityValues
member.summary: Returns available Capability Values for every Capability Name
member.returns: Dictionary of Capability Name along with List of possible values of the Capability
member.example: Capability Name = mobile_browser, value = Safari, Andriod Webkit

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.GetAllClientCapabilities
member.summary: Returns All available Client Capabilities present

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Providers.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.FiftyOneClientCapabilityProvider.SupportsTabletDetection
member.summary: Indicates whether tablet detection is supported in the available data set.
